title: 06/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin has a surprising takeaway from the Clippers loss to the Jazz in game 1 in the second round of the playoffs. He officially announces that he is DONE with Ben Simmons and no longer considers him a true leader of a NBA franchise. He also rips into the Lions for the latest “fumble” and lack of self-awareness. Plus, Raptors head coach Nick Nurse joins the show to breakdown the remaining teams in the NBA playoffs.    

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
